summary:
Unilever is a huge company based in London, making many products we use daily. It started in 1929 when two companies merged: Lever Brothers (soap) and Margarine Unie (margarine). Today, they make everything from food (like ice cream and cereals) to beauty products (like Dove soap) and cleaning supplies.

They own famous brands like Knorr, Axe, and Ben & Jerry's. Unilever has grown by buying other companies and now sells products in almost every country. They focus on health and beauty, and their shares are traded on stock exchanges in London and Amsterdam.
title: Unilever
